metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18508 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Network Security Services (NSS) before 3.36.7 and before 3.41.1, amalformed signature can cause a crash due to a null dereference, resultingin a Denial of Service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.2
libnss3-tools - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: nss package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.35-2ubuntu2.2').
